plot: For the first time, Nouli won't be part of the audience. She'll confront her life, alone. Everything is already there. But she must write her own lines.
title: Pame Pali
plot_es: For the first time, Nouli won't be part of the audience. She'll confront her life, alone. Everything is already there. But she must write her own lines.
plot_en: For the first time, Nouli won't be part of the audience. She'll confront her life, alone. Everything is already there. But she must write her own lines.
